ShippingCarrier.name: ShippingCarrier
ShippingCarrier.description: Shipping company or carrier responsible for transporting goods or packages. Examples include UPS, FedEx, and USPS.

ExternalReference.description: Unique code, reference, or identifier for the shipping carrier associated with the delivery. Can be used for internal tracking or integration purposes.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the record was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the shipping carrier associated with the delivery.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who currently owns this ShippingCarrier object. Default value is the user logged in to the API to perform the create.
